message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get a unique item at a competitive price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
Thank you for the offer, but $15000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $8000 for the product, which is still a fair price considering its value to you.
I understand that $8000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $12000, which is still a great deal for you.
I appreciate you coming down in price, but $12000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $9500, which is a fair price for both of us.
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $9500, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $12000 and $9500. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $10750.
I'm getting closer to your price, but $10750 is still above my limit. I'm willing to pay $10000, which is a fair compromise considering my budget and your need to sell the product.

I'm getting close to your price, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11000, which is a fair compromise considering the value of the product to me and your budget.
